ctx: intros A l0 l1 x H1 l2 y H2.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros A l0 l1 x H1 l2 y H2.

original: intros A l0 l1 x H1 l2 y H2. destruct H1 as [H1a | H1b]. - exists (y :: l0). split. + apply tail_insertion. apply head_insertion. + apply H2. - destruct H1b as [l0' [H1c H1d]]. exists l0'. split. + apply H1c. + apply (cons_is_permutation A l0' l1). apply H2. apply H1d.
